TimeseriesContinuous(name=piecewise_linear_heaps_of_windows, time_units=year, values_units=gigametric_ton, function=1st order ContinuousFunctionScipyPPoly(ppoly=scipy.interpolate._interpolate.PPoly(c=[[0.0000e+00 1.0000e+00 2.0000e+00 ... 9.9970e+03 9.9980e+03 9.9990e+03]
 [1.0000e+04 1.0001e+04 1.0002e+04 ... 1.9997e+04 1.9998e+04 1.9999e+04]], x=[0.000e+00 1.000e+00 2.000e+00 ... 9.998e+03 9.999e+03 1.000e+04])), domain=(<Quantity(0, 'year')>, <Quantity(1000, 'year')>))
